tumor_size_max_dimension_evidence: No information provided in the pathology report.
pT_evidence: The tumor classification on the basis of this material is pT4, indicating a tumor of any size that invades the mediastinum or beyond.
pN_evidence: The tumor classification on the basis of this material is pN1, indicating metastasis to ipsilateral peribronchial and/or hilar lymph nodes.
tumor_stage_evidence: The tumor classification on the basis of this material is pT4 pN1 pM1, which corresponds to Stage IV according to AJCC7 criteria.
histologic_diagnosis_evidence: The pathology report describes a mixed adenocarcinoma with glandular tubulopapillary and bronchioloalveolar differentiation, which is consistent with lung adenocarcinoma.
comment: The pathology report describes an extensive and locoregionally advanced central to peripheral bronchopulmonary tumor with pleural invasion and metastatic dissemination. The immune profile confirms the diagnosis of an adenocarcinoma of the lung of mixed differentiation.
